name: V-Artillery
description:
V-Artillery is a co-op game played between two devices. One player uses a Google Cardboard viewer or standalone app to scout enemy ships and relay the coordinates to the other player, the commander. The commander enters the coordinates to destroy the enemy ships. The enemies will come at faster and faster rates. The players must cooperate to get the high score.


To play V-Artillery you will need two devices connected to the same LAN.
